snippet: The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductions take place on Thursday in Brooklyn: Just how does the selection process work?
abstract: New crop of inductees to the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame embody ongoing debate about the selection process, specifically whether it should favor popularity or excellence now that many of gene's giants have already been inducted; upcoming ceremony at Barclays Center in Brooklyn will include Kiss, Nirvana, Peter Gabriel, Linda Ronstadt, Cat Stevens and Hall & Oates.
lead_paragraph: The Rock and Roll Hall of Fame inductions take place on Thursday in Brooklyn: Just how does the selection process work?

headline.main: Hall of Fame Decides Who Rocks, Officially

keywords.value: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
keywords.name: organizations
